data.comment: The big names in today's match at Fisht Olympic Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sergei Ivanov blows against Krasnodar's Ari for offside.
Throw-in Sochi.
[62] ([63]) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Ibrahim Tsallagov (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
So close for Sochi as Aleksandr Kokorin's shot comes back off the post.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Sochi.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ari for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In Sochi Krasnodar's Ari is caught offside.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sochi, Marcus Berg of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Sochi's area.
Sochi pushes forward through Aleksandr Kokorin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Christian Noboa (Sochi) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Sochi's half.
Krasnodar's Fernandes Manuel breaks free at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Wanderson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Ari for Krasnodar is whistled offside.
Anton Zabolotnyi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sochi.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Aleksandr Kokorin of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Sochi throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Goal! Sochi have got their heads in front thanks to a Christian Noboa strike.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Sochi drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Sochi.
Timofey Margasov (Sochi) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Krasnodar drives forward and Marcus Berg gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Sochi are coming forward and Anton Zabolotnyi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sergei Ivanov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Sochi's Christian Noboa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Krasnodar make their first substitution with Daniil Utkin replacing Yuri Gazinskiy.
Ari for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Christian Noboa for Sochi has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
The away team replace Fernandes Manuel with Shapi Suleymanov.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Sochi Krasnodar drive forward through Ari. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Krasnodar's Ari has run offside.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a first substitution, with Nikita Burmistrov replacing Anton Zabolotnyi.
Krasnodar's Ari is whistled for offside at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Sochi throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Throw-in Sochi.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Egor Sorokin is on a sub for Kristoffer Olsson for Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Ari misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Sochi are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sochi's Aleksandr Kokorin gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov waits before resuming play because Ivan Novoseltsev for Sochi is still down.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Christian Noboa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergei Ivanov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Shapi Suleymanov is booked for the away team.
Ibrahim Tsallagov (Sochi) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Ivan Novoseltsev (Sochi) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Nikita Kalugin.
Goal! Andrey Mostovoy extends Sochi's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Timofey Margasov to set up the goal.
Aleksandre Karapetian is replacing Aleksandr Kokorin for the home team.
